item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
We have a guy in the guild that will SAY on Ventrilo ... please psssst me. (wtf)
Even more obnoxious are the people that SAY lawlz into Vent instead of, oh I dunno, LAUGHING. Really devalues the lol, or the heartier LOL, in chat and they were pretty meaningless already.
item.content:encoded:
We have a guy in the guild that will SAY on Ventrilo … please psssst me. (wtf)

Even more obnoxious are the people that SAY lawlz into Vent instead of, oh I dunno, LAUGHING. Really devalues the lol, or the heartier LOL, in chat and they were pretty meaningless already.

item.title: By: wardenpug
item.dc:creator: wardenpug
item.description:
Has anyone noticed that PST instead of its intended meaning of "Please Send Tell" is now a word in itself? I guess it just stands for tell or whisper now...
please pst miss pst pst me
/sigh
item.content:encoded:
Has anyone noticed that PST instead of its intended meaning of “Please Send Tell” is now a word in itself? I guess it just stands for tell or whisper now…

please pst
miss pst
pst me

/sigh

item.title: By: Eon Blue
item.dc:creator: Eon Blue
item.description: Reading a WoW forums thread is like watching a parade of retarded children, and waiting for one to fall down so all the others can laugh at him.
item.content:encoded: Reading a WoW forums thread is like watching a parade of retarded children, and waiting for one to fall down so all the others can laugh at him.
